Class Klient

  • java.lang.Object
    • Klient

  • public class Klient
extends java.lang.Object
    accesses remote json data at abgeordnetenwatch.de for retrieving answer to a political context. A context is called subGroup and they have common top level Groups A question includes answer and subGruop, which is called category according to json profile of abgeordnetenwatch.de
    Version:
    1.0, 15.9.2017
    Author:
    Rainer Wichmann

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Klient(java.lang.String subGroup)
      constructor Klient(subGroup) sets attributes subGroup,

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getText(java.lang.String questionUrl, Erststimme erst)
      Klient.getText() is called to return a question to the category from a profile, which is available via the String questionUrl attributes candidateProfile, firstname and lastname are set is asking to receive a SingleProfile from getDataUrl, uses a mapper or a client+webtarget+invocationbuilder+response if no answer is availabe, it asks the Caller , a Erststimme erst, via erst.noAnswer() erst.alternativeAnswerfromSpeechelper() to return an alternative answer if erst has no alternative answer, a simple dummy answer is returned

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Klient

        public Klient(java.lang.String subGroup)
        constructor Klient(subGroup) sets attributes subGroup,
        Parameters:
        subGroup - String representing the political context

    • Method Detail

      • getText

        public java.lang.String getText(java.lang.String questionUrl,
                                Erststimme erst)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException,
                                com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException
        Klient.getText() is called to return a question to the category from a profile, which is available via the String questionUrl attributes candidateProfile, firstname and lastname are set is asking to receive a SingleProfile from getDataUrl, uses a mapper or a client+webtarget+invocationbuilder+response if no answer is availabe, it asks the Caller , a Erststimme erst, via erst.noAnswer() erst.alternativeAnswerfromSpeechelper() to return an alternative answer if erst has no alternative answer, a simple dummy answer is returned
        Parameters:
        questionUrl - String of the url where the questions of the candidate can be found
        erst - may be used for asking for the Erststimme erst, if no answer at all is available. Not implemented yet
        Returns:
        String representing the answer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - during json mapping in mapper.readValue
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException - during json mapping in mapper.readValue
        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException - during json mapping in mapper.readValue
